channel.title: Blocking tele in combat
channel.description: Ok i found a very nice source the other day. and i played another server with it before with those commands ::home and ::pk2 but the problem is that i wanted to add a teleblock but i didnt exactly know how i mean like if your in combat fighting a npc or player you shouldnt be able to teleport to pk2 or home thats what i need help with please reply with a code Ps its a 317 server not delta heres what commands looks like [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/33cvx8g.jpg[/img]

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @Andersmulle2 Andersmulle2
item.description:
@Andersmulle2 wrote:

i get this when i use the modified code you posted usman

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:17, topic:351706”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=448060.msg3288281#msg3288281 date=1280358814]

if(command.startsWith("pk2") && (!inCombat) { sM("you can't teleport while in combat!"); return; }
Ofcourse this isn’t perfect but you can fix the errors… or is it?
[/quote]

Wrong, that makes it so if he’s not in combat, he can’t use the command. You need to make an else (the teleports) as well.[/quote]Haha your right, edited post

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:16, topic:351706”] if(command.startsWith("pk2") && (!inCombat) { sM("you can't teleport while in combat!"); return; }
Ofcourse this isn’t perfect but you can fix the errors… or is it?[/quote]

Wrong, that makes it so if he’s not in combat, he can’t use the command. You need to make an else (the teleports) as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("pk2") && (!inCombat) { toX = 2758; toY = 3486; } else if(command.startsWith("pk2") && (inCombat) { sM("you can't teleport while in combat!"); return; }
Ofcourse this isn’t perfect but you can fix the errors… or is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:8, topic:351706”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=448060.msg3288222#msg3288222 date=1280355631]
if(!inCombat || combatTimer) {
if(command.equals(blah)) {
toX = blah;
toY = blah;
} else {
sM(“blah blah cannot blah.”);
}
}
[/quote]
wouldn’t that stop him from being able to teleport while in combat? Maybe he wants to telly in combat.

and usman, you are missing a bracket.[/quote]

He said he doesn’t want people using the command when fighting an NPC or a player.

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking tele in combat
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:11, topic:351706”]I c. You want me to end like this?

sM("Welcome to pk2"); } }[/quote]
yes

[quote=“John459, post:12, topic:351706”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=448060.msg3288214#msg3288214 date=1280355368]

if (Command.equals("pk2")) { if (teleblock = true) { sendMessage("You can't teleport while teleblocked"); return; } else { toX = 2758; toY = 3486; sM("Welcome To pk2"); } }

You will have to change it up.
[/quote]That code will give 100 errors as far as I know.

That would not give 100 errors. If you think it will then you need to read up on Java a bit.[/quote]

It will give him 5-6 errors for sure, if he copies and pastes it.

Read full topic

ok so I’m not perfect.

let me try
